relevant_chunks.text: Step 1 – To launch the Recovery Configuration Utility, double-click the Recovery_Config.ex e executable at the following location in the Recovery for Active Directory installation directory: ...Netwrix\Recovery for Active Directory\Recovery_Config.exe Step 2 – Update the account password for SQL Server Authentication in the Login and Password fields.
v2.6 v2.5 v2.6 Run the NetwrixRecovery_Setup.exe on the Netwrix Recovery for Active Directory server to upgrade to the newer version of the product.
v2.6 Step 8 – On the Netwrix Recovery Server Configuration page, enter the port and credentials to be used for running the application server.
Step 1 – Run the NetwrixRecovery_Setup.exe executable as an administrator to launch the Recovery for Active Directory Setup wizard.
Step 3 – Specify an account to validate the server, install the Netwrix Server Backup Configuration agent there, and perform server backups.
